SmallPackage - Class in components
Represents a small package
A small package is a package that weighs only one unit

Constructs and initializes a SmallPackage with values
Example: SmallPackage(Priority.LOW, new Address(3,123456), new Address(4,123456), true)

STANDARD Priority
StandardPackage - Class in components
Represents a package with varying weights over one unit
StandardPackage(Priority, Address, Address, double) - Constructor for class components.StandardPackage
Constructs and initializes a SmallPackage with values
Example: StandardPackage(Priority.LOW, new Address(3,123456), new Address(4,123456), 4.33)
StandardTruck - Class in components
Represents a vehicle that used for delivering small packages and standard packages Transfer many packages per trip. Collects only SmallPackage and StandardPackage. Got a weight limit.
StandardTruck() - Constructor for class components.StandardTruck
Constructs and initializes a StandardTruck by default
Random License plate, Model and maxWeight
StandardTruck(String, String, int) - Constructor for class components.StandardTruck
Constructs and initializes a StandardTruck by values
Example: StandardTruck("123-45-678", "M3", 500)
